New Records: United States of America, the No. 19 ranked cricket team in T20Is, shocked Bangladesh, the ninth ranked team in the world, with a five-wicket victory in Texas, taking a 1-0 lead in the three-match series
Key Match Events: Harmeet Singh struck the winning runs in a chase of 154 after his three consecutive sixes turned the tide in favour of the USA
Harmeet Singh finished unbeaten on 33 off 13 balls, adding 62 runs in 4.4 overs for the unbroken sixth wicket stand with Corey Anderson, who was not out on 34
Towhid Hridoy top-scored with 58, lasting till the 20th over
Litton Das fell for 14 in the fifth over, Jasdeep Singh's superb first over bowled him lbw
Soumya Sarkar followed him back to the dugout three balls later
Najmul Hossain Shanto got stumped off Steven Taylor
Harmeet bowled the first of his two no-balls, Mahmudullah struck Khan for a four and a six in the 17th over, but fell trying to heave Saurabh Netravalkar over long-on
Monank Patel couldn't take advantage of being dropped by his opposite number Shanto in the third over, when he was run out from Taylor's straight drive
Andries Gous got going with a punched four through the covers, Taylor slammed Shakib for a six before Gous hit Rishad Hossain for two fours in the seventh over
Gous repeated the dose on Rishad in the legspinner's next over, but then top edged a sweep to the deep backward square-leg boundary
Nitish Kumar struck a six off Shakib in the 14th over to break a 31-ball sequence of no boundaries but he fell trying to clear Shoriful in the 15th over
Harmeet pinged Mustafizur for two straight sixes to hand back the pressure to Bangladesh
Anderson was minding his own business even as Harmeet was landing the big sixes, Anderson finally struck a six off his 22nd ball when he crashed Mustafizur over long-on in the penultimate over
Pre-Game Insights: Experts' predictions or expectations were not mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: USA Cricket praised Harmeet and Anderson for their heroics as USA stun Bangladesh
USA took a 1-0 lead in the three-match series, picking up their second win against a Full Member in T20Is, following their victory against Ireland in 2021
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Prairie View, USA, as part of the Bangladesh tour of United States of America
The USA team dominated most of the proceedings, restricting Bangladesh to 153 for 6
The article highlights the individual performances of the USA and Bangladesh players, including Harmeet Singh, Corey Anderson, Towhid Hridoy, and Mahmudullah
